statement_text: When you’ve got planes, or people having sex or human contact, and when you have people breathing, the genie’s out of the bottle. I think it [seeing cases in other countries]’s probably going to be a matter of time before we see cases of clade Ib in other countries and I think the hope is that we can at least get a handle on what’s going on in the worst affected areas.

rationale: The potent metaphor 'the genie’s out of the bottle' is used.
